"Blessed are ye, when men shall 
 revile you." Matthew 5:11. 


     Ever since his fall, Satan has worked by means of deception. As he has misrepresented God, so, through his agents, he misrepresents the children of God. The Saviour says, "The reproaches of them that reproached 
                                                                           32
Thee are fallen upon Me." Psalm 69:9. In like manner they fall upon His disciples.
